contentrichtext.text: The '''Ezzelini''' were a noble family in medieval Italy. *The family was founded by '''Ecelo''' ('''Ezzelo'''), who received the fiefs of [[Romano d'Ezzelino]] and [[Onara (Italy)|Onara]] *[[Ezzelino I da Romano]] (d. c. 1080), called ''il Balbo'' *[[Ezzelino II da Romano]] (d. 1235), called ''il Monaco'', son of Ezzelino I *[[Ezzelino III da Romano]] (d. 1259), called ''il Tiranno'', son of Ezzelino II *[[Alberico da Romano]] (d. 1260), son of Ezzelino II *[[Cunizza da Romano]] (b. c. 1198), daughter of Ezzelino II [[Category:Ezzelini|*]] [[Category:Italian noble families]]
